rows.label: qev013304_MSG0001
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013304_MSG0002
rows.name: Raleigh here. Do you copy?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013304_MSG0003
rows.name:
Peter said you went in to evacuate Bates.
Did you manage to find the rook alive?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013304_MSG0004
rows.name:
...Dead when you found him?! Ugh!
Where was he?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013304_MSG0005
rows.name:
West of the Emerian Battlegrounds in Cauldros?
...Isn't that area highly contaminated?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013304_MSG0006
rows.name:
The toxins must have been what killed him.
But what could've made him head that way?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013304_JNK0010
rows.name: Refrain

rows.label: qev013304_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Raleigh you have no idea.

rows.label: qev013304_JNK0020
rows.name: Confess

rows.label: qev013304_SEL0021
rows.name: Admit that you sent Bates that way.

rows.label: qev013304_MSG0007
rows.name: Hey, you didn't... No. Never mind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013304_MSG0008
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013304_MSG0009
rows.name: I...I see...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013304_MSG0010
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013304_MSG0011
rows.name:
Well, this is no time for tears. Not while there are
others that might still be saved.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013304_MSG0012
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013304_MSG0013
rows.name:
As it turns out, I've just received word from Corwin.
He's at Banshee Cave in Sylvalum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013304_MSG0014
rows.name:
That was all he could tell me before he started taking
fire. Bastards were right on top of him...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013304_MSG0015
rows.name: I'm counting on you to see him back to New LA alive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013304_MSG0016
rows.name:
Whatever happens to the team, we'll find a way
through it so long as he's alive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013304_JNK0030
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev013304_SEL0031
rows.name: Agree to help no matter what.

rows.label: qev013304_JNK0040
rows.name: Resist

rows.label: qev013304_SEL0041
rows.name: Say that you're not confident you can pull it off.

rows.label: qev013304_MSG0017
rows.name: That means a lot. You're as reliable as Corwin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013304_MSG0018
rows.name:
Just promise me you'll keep your eyes peeled for that
black Skell, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013304_MSG0019
rows.name:
Look, I know it's not an easy assignment, and I won't
ask you to make promises you can't keep.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev013304_MSG0020
rows.name:
Just know that you're all we've got, okay?
We're trusting you with this, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]
